tool_description: Schedules and queues notifications for delivery at optimal times based on customer preferences, time zones, and business rules.

priority.description: Message priority: low, normal, high, urgent

scheduled_time.description: Specific time to send (date-time format), null for immediate

expire_after.description: Hours after which message expires if not delivered

error_messages: Customer not found: The provided customer_id does not exist in the system.
Template not found: The specified template_id does not exist.
Invalid channel type: channel_type must be one of: email, sms, push.
Invalid priority: priority must be one of: low, normal, high, urgent.
Invalid scheduled time: scheduled_time must be in the future and in valid date-time format.
Channel not enabled: The specified channel is not enabled for this customer.
Frequency limit exceeded: Cannot schedule message due to frequency restrictions.
usage: Provide customer_id, template_id, and channel_type. Optionally set priority, scheduled_time, template variables, and expiration time.

message_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled message
